sentences.pinyin: wǒ bǎ zhǒng zǐ sàn zài le dì shàng.
sentences.translation: I scattered the seeds on the ground.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我等不及春天的到来，在冬天就已经把种子散满了整个花园。
sentences.traditionalText: 我等不及春天的到來，在冬天就已經把種子散滿了整個花園。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ děng bù jí chūn tiān de dào lái, zài dōng tiān jiù yǐ jīng bǎ zhǒng zǐ sàn mǎn le zhěng gè huā yuán.
sentences.translation: I can't wait for the arrival of spring, so I already scattered the seeds all over the garden in winter.

sentences.simplifiedText: 会议结束后，人们慢慢地从会议室散去。
sentences.traditionalText: 會議結束後，人們慢慢地從會議室散去。
sentences.pinyin: Huìyì jiéshù hòu, rénmen màn màn de cóng huìyìshì sàn qù.
sentences.translation: After the meeting ended, people gradually dispersed from the conference room.
I need to clear my mind.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在阅读这个困难的材料后，我需要散散心，以便更好地理解。
sentences.traditionalText: 在閱讀這個困難的材料後，我需要散散心，以便更好地理解。
sentences.pinyin: Zài yuèdú zhège kùnnán de cáiliào hòu, wǒ xūyào sàn sàn xīn, yǐbiàn gèng hǎo de lǐjiě.
sentences.translation: After reading this difficult material, I need to clear my mind for better understanding.
